patthana4.4:6.1: Akusalaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:9.1: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:9.2: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.4:9.3: Kusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noāsavo ca abyākato noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana4.4:10.1: Akusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:11.1: Abyākataṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.4:12.1: Kusalaṃ noāsavañca abyākataṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1

patthana4.4:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.4:19.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … novigate pañca.
patthana4.4:21.1: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.4:22.1: Akusalo noāsavo dhammo akusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:24.1: Kusalo noāsavo dhammo kusalassa noāsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.4:25.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana4.4:29.1: Kusalaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.4:35.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … novigate pañca.

patthana4.4:40.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate terasa.

patthana4.4:46.1: Hetuyā dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.

patthana4.4:56.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri … pe … kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.

patthana4.4:60.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.

patthana4.4:67.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā satta … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate satta.
